co.cask.tigon.lang.jar
Class ProgramClassLoader

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.ClassLoader
      java.security.SecureClassLoader
          java.net.URLClassLoader
              co.cask.tigon.lang.jar.ProgramClassLoader

public class ProgramClassLoader
extends URLClassLoader

ClassLoader that implements bundle jar feature, in which the application jar contains its dependency jars inside the "/lib" folder (by default) within the application jar.

Useful for 1) using third party jars that overwrite each other's files (e.g. Datanucleus jars each have plugin.xml at same location relative to the jar root, so if you package your application as an uber-jar, your application jar will only contain one of the plugin.xml at best unless you do some manual configuration.

Not (yet) useful for 1) avoiding classpath conflicts with Tigon's dependency jars (e.g. you want to use Guava 16.0.1 but Tigon uses 13.0.1)

Constructor Detail

ProgramClassLoader

public ProgramClassLoader(File unpackedJarDir,
                          ClassLoader parentDelegate)
Convenience class to construct a classloader for a program from an unpacked jar directory. Adds /{.,*.jar,lib/*.jar} to the URLClassLoader.

Parameters:
unpackedJarDir - Directory of the unpacked jar to be used in the classpath.
parentDelegate - Parent classloader.
